participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin.
I have never been arrested, but I sometimes need to be alone to clear my head.
I love my family, but they can be very critical of me.
I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.
i live with my boyfriend of 5 years.

participant_2.background:
I hope I can find a way to combine my two loves: paddle boarding and makeup.
I get to show off my long fingernails.
i m an out of work farmhand.
i have depression and anxiety so i do not really go out a lot.
i am young.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Hi! My day is going well. I am working on a project for my art class that combines makeup and paddle boarding.
That sounds really cool! I hope it goes well.
Thanks! I'm trying to figure out how to do it without getting my makeup all over the paddle board.
Maybe you could use a waterproof sealant?
That's a good idea! I will have to try that.
I hope you figure it out!
I'm actually looking for a new place to live. I have sensitive skin and I'm looking for a place with a better climate.
Oh, that makes sense. I have never had any issues with my skin, but I know that it can be a problem for some people.
Yeah, it can be really frustrating.
Where are you thinking of moving?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still doing some research.
Oh, okay. Well, I hope you find a great place to live!
